message.body: (01/02) Are you free to talk this evening? It can be just 5 min if you prefer. I have a time-sensitive question that I need to ask you. NOTHING to be anxious or
(02/02) nervous about, just need your input asap.
If looking forward to hearing from you is holding on to things then i guess I'm holding on. I have little expectation, just anticipation
I just meant holding onto the word "soon" and holding it against me
Not holding it against you Mattie. Just hoping by soon you meant sometime.
Are you able to put into text your response from last night? Its just a really big deal and decision to me and I just need to know where you stand
